data.title: Next stop: WKMG Hits the Road to downtown Orlando
data.meta_description: Now, it’s Downtown Orlando’s turn as News 6 will highlight stories in the 32801 ZIP code.
data.text:
WKMG has been highlighting communities across Central Florida.

We have asked viewers in east Orange, Seminole, southeast Lake and Osceola counties what stories they would like us to cover. We checked out what made each community unique, we investigated issues, and helped get results during live broadcasts in each area.

Now, it’s downtown Orlando’s turn as News 6 will highlight stories in the 32801 ZIP code.

You can make your voice heard by filling out the form below. Tell us why your community is so special, what are the hidden gems, what are some of the challenges and let us know how we can help you get results.

Don’t be surprised when we follow up with you directly.

See ya soon!
